description.value: You gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. If you have the fearless racial trait, you are immune to fear instead. If you fail a saving throw against fear, you can end the spell as an immediate action to reroll the save with a +4 morale bonus, and must take the new result, even if it is worse.
